prompt: MC Escher staircase paradox brought to life, impossible architecture where stairs lead up and down simultaneously, figures walk in perpetual loops defying gravity, black and white lithograph style, the camera pans revealing the spatial contradiction. Monochrome, geometric precision, mind-bending.

Floating Gaud√≠ cathedral made of organic curves and mosaics drifts through clouds, the structure defies physics with spiraling towers and liquid stone, stained glass windows glow from within, the building breathes and shifts subtly as if alive. Surreal architectural dream, golden hour light.

Minimalist Japanese tea house in the void, the simple wooden structure sits on a platform surrounded by infinite white emptiness, a single cherry blossom tree beside it drops petals that disappear into the nothingness below. Zen, liminal, contemplative. Shot like a Tarkovsky film.

Brutalist concrete pyramid dissolving into particles, the massive structure breaks apart block by block revealing glowing geometry inside, each cube floats away and disintegrates into smaller cubes recursively, mathematical destruction. Dark moody sky, late afternoon light.

Art Nouveau greenhouse at midnight, wrought iron and glass structure with organic flowing lines, bioluminescent plants inside glow blue and green, vines crawl up the curved metal supports, steam rises from tropical humidity, moonlight filters through ornate glass panels. Victor Horta aesthetic.
